title: Betfair23
author: Betfair23
content: I have some $$ in revoult and want to buy crypto if there is any seller please contact me escrow accepted

comments.author: alterra57
comments.body: If you want to send out of Revolut through SEPA I'd be interested.

comments.author: Betfair23
comments.body: Quote from: alterra57 on October 22, 2023, 06:19:14 PMIf you want to send out of Revolut through SEPA I'd be interested.how?

comments.author: alterra57
comments.body: Quote from: Betfair23 on October 22, 2023, 06:51:32 PMQuote from: alterra57 on October 22, 2023, 06:19:14 PMIf you want to send out of Revolut through SEPA I'd be interested.how?Revolut works like a normal bank, you must have a SEPA account under your name. Here's a tutorial: https://blog.revolut.com/sepa-instant-euro-transfers-now-available/Btw, are you accepting escrow and how much money is this?

comments.author: aoluain
comments.body: You can also send FIAT via Revolut simply with a rev tag! its instant.

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: As OP is a newbie I want to say that if you send the fund to the reputed person then there is no problem before making the deal check their feedback and rank. Also, do not make any deal over any other third-party apps like Telegram. If you do not feel comfortable sending first then you are free to use any escrow from the list of "Few Trusted Escrow Providers"

They charge no fees for now. [ANN][bptrades] Escrow Services for Secure Trading - Buy & Sell Safely - 0 Fees
